title: TIME MASTERS
description:
this was one of my favorite movie as a child,so i tried to find every version available the video is a DVD rip 720x608 the quality is very good ,the french audio is 5.1 surround,the others are stereo.some of the audio is low quality but that's the only ones i found.
i recommend using VLC media player,you can convert it to mp4 very easy if you want to.

6 audio LANGUAGES:
-english
-hungarian (digitally restored)magyar-digitalisan felujitott
-hungarian (original)
-french
-german
-russian

5 SUBTITLES
-hungarian (magyar)
-portugues
-english
-italiano
-espanol
